name: Otter Space Adventure
description:
NASO (The National Association for Space Otters) is ready to send the Otternauts to explore Otter Space! But before they left the atmosphere, NASO's satellites detected a meteor storm! Help NASO's finest Otternauts save the planet by destroying the meteors before they crash into Earth!

Instructions:

Tap left side to move left

Tap right side to move right

Tap center to shoot

You may also use the arrow keys and the space bar

This game also implements adaptive difficulty. The higher you score, the faster asteroids spawn.

Find out more about NASO: https://tinyurl.com/spaceotters
Made by CodePy Media: http://cpmedia.ga/
